long_description: Set the pace in the TYR Check Crossfit Swimsuit for women. It's designed to be fast enough for competition and tough enough for training. High-performance polyester/spandex fabric sustains many hours of use while 4-way stretch construction maintains a comfortable fit on your body. Check Crossfit Swimsuit is made of Durafast Lite and is 30% lighter than traditional swimwear. Crossfit styling offers good coverage with a medium neckline, sleek/flexible straps, open back and moderate-cut leg line. The TYR Check Crossfit Swimsuit for women is fully lined and provides UPF 50+ protection.
short_description: Set the pace in the TYR Check Crossfit Swimsuit for women. It's designed to be fast enough for competition and tough enough for training.
